name: SiebelScriptingReview: Scripting The PreCanInvokeMethod Event For A Business Service
description: Using this event for a business service may degrade the performance of the business service.
output: This rule reports Business Services with code in the PreCanInvokeMethod
rationale: The Service_PreCanInvokeMethod event is there to allow the selective ability to invoke a business service's method.  One does not have to script this event to enable the method.  Business service methods are active by default.
remediation: Remove script from the above business services as it is not necessary.
total: Number of added or modified PrecCanInvokeMethod in Business Services
alternativeName: SiebelScriptingReview: Scripting The PreCanInvokeMethod Event For A Business Service

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
